official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain machined electronic connector contact parts.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1993, the duty on machined electronic connector contact parts, one-half inch or less in length, for use in aerospace or military equipment applications.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain machined electronic connector contact parts.
